title: Finding Joy: The Year Apart That Made Me A Better Wife
description: If you’ve ever found yourself in a long-distance marriage and wondered if it was possible not only to survive but also to thrive, then Finding Joy is for you.As a military spouse and mother (with one of her children being a young cancer survivor), Hope has faced some long, lonely nights questioning God’s faithfulness and the strength of her marriage.Hope invites you—through personal experience, examples of others in history, and Scripture—to explore the possibility of a stronger more fulfilling marriage.Together we are stronger. Together we can overcome any obstacle. You don’t have to do it alone.
author: Hope N. Griffin
